description: SQLmap is a tool used in penetration testing to detect and exploit SQL injection flaws
XSStrike is a Cross Site Scripting detection suite equipped with four hand written parsers, an intelligent payload generator, a powerful fuzzing engine and an incredibly fast crawler.
WPScan scans for vulnerabilities in websites that run WordPress web engines.
Nmap is used to discover hosts and services on a computer network by sending packets and analyzing the responses.
This module gets various subdomains listed in a domains SSL cert.
A fuzzing tool used for enumerating subdomains through multiple methods.
An enumeration tool used to discover resources in a web server database through different methods.
This module will try to detect the presence of a web application firewall and its type and version.
Identifies the technologies used on a webpage using whatweb.
Searchsploit allows you to easily search The Exploit Database archive for entries based on criteria of your choosing.
